name: Advanced Hover Effects On Image Wpbeckary(Visual Composer)
author: themescup

sections.description:
Advanced Wpbeckery Hover Effects is a collection of some advanced and beautiful Hover Effects that helps you to easily create magnificent interactive IMAGES in your website.

Live Demo

Features:

  • 10 Advaced and Amazing Hover Effects
  • 100% Resposive
  • FontAwesome Icon Supported
  • Fully Customizable
  • Any Color You Choose
  • More Are Coming Up

Tags: video slider, team slider, fulwidth slider, testimonial slider, animated multi-imahge slider.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

The easy way:

    Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
    Search for “ CSS Image Hover Effects for WPBakery Page Builder  ”
    Click “Install”

The not so easy way:

    Upload the ml-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
    Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    Manage your slideshows using the ‘ CSS Image Hover Effects for WPBakery Page Builder’ menu option
